education.degree: Bachelor's in Fine Arts: New Media

workExperience.desc: Developed a dynamic conference schedule built with react embedded in a Framer project. Challenges of this project include not using any imports, generating CSV files, and using Google Sheets as a database.

f2pool and stakefish are leading service providers for blockchain infrastructure security. The marketing team promoted and raised awareness to cutting edge projects in the world of crypto.
